mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviewdetails (review_id, day, content) VALUES (#{reviewId}, #{day}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT id, review_id as reviewId, `day`, content, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM reviewdetails WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, review_id AS reviewId, `day`, content, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM reviewdetails WHERE review_id = #{reviewId} ORDER BY `day` ASC
